FuncDef: This command configures the source ip-address used in the connection toward the neighbor. The local address is optional. If specified the node will accept connections only for that address in the service running ANCP. The address may be created after the reference but connections will not be accepted until it is created. If the local address is not used, the system accepts connections on any interface within the routing context.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the source IP address to be used in the connection toward the neighbor.
